nodes.text: This Lucrehulk-class Battleship was the command ship of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' naval forces at the Battle of Ryloth. After taking part in the Separatist blockade of Ryloth, it was attacked by a Galactic Republic fleet led by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker. The battleship was destroyed when Skywalker rammed the Venator-class Star Destroyer Defender into it.

This Lucrehulk-class Battleship first appeared in "Storm Over Ryloth," the nineteenth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on February 27, 2009.
